description: This file defines the SemanticChunking class, a strategy for splitting documents into semantic chunks using the chonkie library. It imports necessary modules, handles optional dependencies, and implements the chunking logic with metadata management.

classes.name: SemanticChunking
classes.description: A chunking strategy that splits text into semantic chunks using the chonkie library.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the SemanticChunking with optional embedder, chunk size, and similarity threshold.

methods.name: chunk
methods.description: Splits a Document into semantic chunks using chonkie and returns a list of chunked Documents.
